Example: My school is very big.
The students are in the classroom.
The teacher explains the lesson.
She is a good student.
The principal gave a speech.
Today’s lesson is about history.
Math is my favorite subject.
I do my homework every evening.
The exam is next week.
We have a test tomorrow.
I borrowed a book from the library.
Write your notes in the notebook.
I need a pen to write.
He drew a picture with a pencil.
Use the ruler to draw a straight line.
I erased the mistake with an eraser.
The library has many books.
She studies at a university.
He goes to college in New York.
Education is very important for children.
He covered himself with a blanket.
I need a towel after taking a shower.
Don’t forget your toothbrush!
Wash your hands with soap.
She filled the bucket with water.
